title: PETITION TO MAKE GAREN GAIN 1HP IF HE DOES 100 PUSH UP

replies.body: Make his push-up speed based off attack speed as well.
full AS HP garen op

Also make his E apply on-hit effects so it isn't anti-synergistic with {{item:3748}}. Not sure how many times it should though, maybe, IDK, once per spin? 10 {{item:3748}} procs over three seconds at level 16 seems pretty reasonable, his E would still apply them slower if he has more than 3.33 AS, which he should only be getting past if his team has Lulu or someone with Ardent Censer (I guess also Ezreal with his W), since full build he usually of course only has 3.32 AS
Question: Would it proc on every enemy he spins on or only 1?
On each champion. With five champions around him, he turns it into Ravenous Titanic Hydra.
yes

I'm confused....
You know there's a 2.5 attack speed cap right?
yes lol

or ms like yi and rammus dance
they should just make every animation scalewith ms
ad
Why not both? It's an exercise that increases both strength and endurance.
What i was thinking :3

#DEMACIA!

https://68.media.tumblr.com/65a5c080394e43f8826780cd09eca894/tumblr_naltuuB69m1t2mux2o3_500.gif

https://media.tenor.com/images/749378b1690286ae43aa1ad4ce174386/tenor.gif

also i think it should also be +1 AD
Considering how good Garen's scalings are this might actually make a difference. Push ups between every wave bois

nah, i just used the power of inspect element

>cuz spaghetti code

Real reason why I rent Morellonomicon on Kennen:

https://1drv.ms/i/s!AuFMZD__7mN2gRrTtkj2OuaEj4ry
Actually, you can achieve that by spamming gargoyle stoneplate near 3 dummies in training mode. Also you can one shot everything if you do it as Tahm Kench.
pretty sure they patched that out
It´s still possible in trainingsmode, but you need like 5 minutes to get a high enough value of hp to reach negative values. As it seems towers sometimes won´t attack you with negative life.
was talking about the repeated health gain itself, guess I just wasn't near three enemies last time I tried lol

Didn't you make this thread 10 months ago? I know this is memes and games but...

It doesn't really bother but does look like a fish for likes.

Maybe in another 10 months he'll make the same thread hoping everyone will forgot?
He probably has multiple accounts to upvote himself. I know a lot of people got exposed for that in the boards.
Yes i did and i am reposting it untill riot implements it
why not 100 hp for 1 push up?

Better idea...

Gains 1 HP per 50 pushups.
inb4 support garen with relic shield doing push ups while adc is farming
Wrong section, this needs to be under gameplay.
Fcking mods and their deletions
did it under gameplay but laughing fish senpai said to post it in m&g

While I would like to see this added, didn't they remove the -1 damage to champions/skins with shades from Leona's passive, and Fizz/Nami's +1 movement speed while in river and all the other easter eggs because LS$ and in the name of clarity (and equality)?

Pity, because I greatly enjoy such easter eggs.
They also removed GP's "I'm a pirate!" buff and Miss Fortune's "I'm a pirate... Hunter!" buff.

Seriously!? Was that "buff" anything other than a cosmetic one anyway, like the "Queen of Freljord" one?
And the Caitlyn/Vi/Jinx cosmetic buff is also gone then, I presume.

Great, guess the Kha'Zix/Rengar buff will be gone soon too then. :|

GP and MF were purely cosmetic. Ashe, Sejuani and Lissandra were cosmetic and based off the Freljord event shortly after Lissandra's release.

Kha'Zix/Rengar I'm very certain still exists to (possibly) grant Kha'Zix his 4th evolution at level 18.

Caitlyn's/Vi's actually did have a functional use where if they both took part in an enemy takedown, each would get 10 gold.

Jinx, as far as I'm aware, was cosmetic but still held a running tally of escapes (which was probably whenever she killed Vi/Caitlyn).
patch 9.10: we decided {{champion:497}} and {{champion:498}} having synergy is too op and therefore we deleted the special interactions.
Why is this in Memes/Games, it should be in gameplay (but lets be honest gameplay board itself is a meme)

{{champion:86}} *survives with 1 hp*

RIOT THIS BUFF IS GAMEBREAKING AND OP!
This would actually be a funny easter egg, to make his animation faster with AS would make it more fun.

{{champion:81}} : Yes, report him, he is standing next to blue buff and spamming his taunt.
{{champion:86}} : Why report me ? i'm getting ready for late game, if you don't know how Garen works don't talk.
